title: Israel rally could slow traffic on Spring Street
title_page: Atlanta News: Israel rally could slow traffic on Spring Street
text:
A rally in Midtown during the evening commute Wednesday could have traffic implications.
The WSB Traffic Center is keeping an eye on the 1400 block of Spring Street between 6 p.m. and 8 p.m., when an Israel rally is being held at the Jewish Federation of Greater Atlanta.
“We hope everyone is mindful of the potential traffic situation,” said Steve Winslow, WSB traffic reporter. “That motorists are aware that there could be a number of people gathering, and that pedestrians are mindful of the vehicular traffic.”
An advisory from the Midtown Blue public safety force advises motorists to plan accordingly for potential traffic tie-ups.
